alert.note: Alert for Spencer (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 17 at 10:16AM EDT until June 17 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 381 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST INDIANA SPENCER IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN WESTERN KENTUCKY BALLARD CALDWELL CALLOWAY CARLISLE CHRISTIAN DAVIESS FULTON GRAVES HICKMAN HOPKINS LYON MARSHALL MCCRACKEN MCLEAN MUHLENBERG TODD TRIGG IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSOURI MISSISSIPPI NEW MADRID THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BARDWELL, BENTON, CADIZ, CALHOUN, CHARLESTON, CLINTON, EDDYVILLE, ELKTON, GREENVILLE, HICKMAN, HOPKINSVILLE, MADISONVILLE, MAYFIELD, MURRAY, NEW MADRID, OWENSBORO, PADUCAH, PRINCETON, ROCKPORT, AND WICKLIFFE.
